text: On 29 November 2024, Syrian opposition group Tahrir al-Sham, along with allied Turkish-backed groups in the Military Operations Command, entered the Syrian Arab Army-held city of Aleppo. The battle began on the third day of a large- scale rebel offensive. It is the first time fighting has broken out in the city since the earlier battle, which began in 2012 and ended in 2016. On 30 November 2024, opposition groups captured most of the city during the collapse of pro-government forces. ==References== Category:November 2024 events Category:December 2024 events Category:2024 in Syria Category:Aleppo Category:Autonomous Administration of North and East Syria
title: Battle of Aleppo (2024)
